amendment.description: To increase funding for State and local grant programs.

action.text: Amendment SA 1112 proposed by Senator Akaka.
Point of order uder the Budget Act raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1112.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1112 made in Senate.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1112 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 42 - 55. Record Vote Number: 178.
Amendment SA 1112 ruled out of order by the chair.
